description.0: A book that once belonged to a court mage of Mondstadt who served the nobility. It contains faithful and comprehensive historical accounts as well as magic spells.

0.0: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>8%</cryo>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.
